Nightlight/Windlord::

"What do you think about it Aerotaur?" asked the femme as soon as 
Grounded left the room.

********************************

Windlord::


Windlord walked and Saw Grounded. "Hey Grounded..." said the 
male "Where ya go?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::Grounded::
> "I think if we asked him truthfully about having his memory chips
> erased then he jsut might go for it in his present state...I will go
> then and let you talk about it....I will try and find the 
guns....but
> first will do something that could help the ship abit."
> Grounded walked out of the room heading for the outside.
>

> > > finished in the lab. Do you know where i might find some
